issue.title: [CF 1421] Feature Request: Condition --> incoming damage (physical vs magic)
issue.body:
Is there a way to differentiate between incoming damage (physical vs magic) as condition?


> Posted by CurseForge user joselito246 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1421 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't know what this means. Conditions are a way to check the current state of things. "Incoming damage" is an event, not a state.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yeah e.g. if unit player is taking over xx % magical damage flash Anti-Magic Shield.

So events are not possible?

(sorry if I'm wasting your time.)

 


> Posted by CurseForge user joselito246
